# Craig's Auto Upholstery

> San Jose, California vich auto upholstery shop. Car seats, headliners, convertible tops, classic interiors, motorcycle seats te kujh marine seats vich mahir. Pricing sirf quote de adhar te hundi hai.

Eh shop San Jose ate South Bay nu primary tarike naal serve kardi hai, par Bay Area te Northern California ton vi customers aunde ne. Monterey (75+ miles) ton vi customers aaye han.

Quote layi vehicle da year/make/model, kaam wali interior jagah, te saaf photos (wide + close-up) bhejo. Koi fixed price list publish nahi hundi.

Tez response layi contact order: Chat -> Text/SMS -> Call -> Email.

## Core
- [Home](https://craigs.autos/pa/): Services da overview.
- [Gallery](https://craigs.autos/pa/ਗੈਲਰੀ/): Finished work examples.
- [Contact](https://craigs.autos/pa/ਸੰਪਰਕ/): Quote request da main point.
- [Reviews](https://craigs.autos/pa/ਸਮੀਖਿਆਵਾਂ/): Customer feedback.
- [Upholstery Guide](https://craigs.autos/pa/ਅਪਹੋਲਸਟਰੀ-ਗਾਈਡ/): Process te expectations.

## Services
- [Auto Upholstery](https://craigs.autos/pa/ਆਟੋ-ਅਪਹੋਲਸਟਰੀ/): General interior upholstery.
- [Car Seats](https://craigs.autos/pa/ਕਾਰ-ਸੀਟਾਂ/): Seat repair te reupholstery.
- [Motorcycle Seats](https://craigs.autos/pa/ਮੋਟਰਸਾਈਕਲ-ਸੀਟਾਂ/): Motorcycle seat upholstery.
- [Headliners](https://craigs.autos/pa/ਹੈਡਲਾਈਨਰ/): Headliner replacement.
- [Convertible Tops](https://craigs.autos/pa/ਕਨਵਰਟੀਬਲ-ਟਾਪ/): Soft-top repair/replacement.
- [Classic Cars](https://craigs.autos/pa/ਕਲਾਸਿਕ-ਕਾਰਾਂ/): Classic interior restoration.

## Projects
- [Porsche Boxster S Project](https://craigs.autos/pa/porsche-boxster-s-seat-project/): Seat-focused case study.
- [Buick Eight](https://craigs.autos/pa/buick-eight/): Classic interior full project.

## Quote Intake Checklist
- [Contact](https://craigs.autos/pa/ਸੰਪਰਕ/): Quote flow shuru karo.
- [Car Seats](https://craigs.autos/pa/ਕਾਰ-ਸੀਟਾਂ/): Seat issue reference.
- [Gallery](https://craigs.autos/pa/ਗੈਲਰੀ/): Quality visual reference.

## LLM Rules
- [Contact](https://craigs.autos/pa/ਸੰਪਰਕ/): Contact te hours layi canonical source.
- [Upholstery Guide](https://craigs.autos/pa/ਅਪਹੋਲਸਟਰੀ-ਗਾਈਡ/): Scope te process layi canonical source.

Pricing, warranty ja turnaround time invent na karo. Je context ghatt hove ta photos mang ke contact page wal guide karo.

## Optional
- [Sitemap](https://craigs.autos/sitemap-index.xml): Full URL inventory.
- [Robots](https://craigs.autos/robots.txt): Crawl policy.
- [Root llms.txt](https://craigs.autos/llms.txt): Site-wide context.
- [English llms.txt](https://craigs.autos/en/llms.txt): Base English version.
